Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 5 nights on a trip to Disneyland. The stay was reasonable. The hotel is quiet. clean and reasonably priced. Breakfast is good, but is exactly the same every day. Would be nice if they rotated the hot items from eggs and sausage to include bacon, hash browns, etc., just to mix it up a bit. WiFi was good. We had a minor problem with a bathroom light during our stay, but it was quickly resolved. It's just a few minutes drive to Disneyland and worked well for our stay. We'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello SteveinCH,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay at our hotel the Quality Inn Placentia.  We are pleased to know that you had a good stay and that you enjoyed our amenities.  Thank you for letting us know that our staff quickly resolve the maintenance issue.  We are about a 10 to 15 minute drive to Disneyland and yes we agree that our hotel tends to be quiet and away from the crowds of Disneyland.  We do have an ample selection of breakfast items and we agree with you that items should be rotated.  Our management team is working towards switching breakfast items on curtains days of the week.    We appreciate your valued feedback and we hope to see again soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: A decent, fairly standard Quality Inn
Summary: Stayed here for an evening, last weekend. The property is clean and reasonably comfortable.  The air conditioner never got the room cool enough and the sink was very slow to drain but that is fairly minor.  A standard spread at breakfast, nothing special but did the job. Basically, a solid Quality Inn, nothing to rave about but no major issues either. Good enough for me. One thing that was curious. My room was prepaid, but I am used to hotels taking a credit card imprint for incidentals. Most don't actually run it and place a hold on $ on your credit card.  These folks did and it was a $100 hold. For incidentals. That seems awfully high to me and I recognize it will drop off eventually but is a nuisance in the meantime. What kind of incidentals does this property think I could
Manager Response: Hello Jackerson,  We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that you liked our breakfast.  We have a ample selections for breakfast and we try to  cater to all ages.  We have plenty of pastries and sweet cereals as well as oatmeal, yogurts, milk and juices.  You can also make your own waffle and add sausage patties and egg patties to your plate.   We do require a credit card for incidentals when you check in.  The reason for the incidental policy is to cover any broken equipment or furniture and also to make sure that guests do not smoke in our non smoking rooms. We release your authorizations at check out time.  We hope that you consider our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Only if it's the only one available
Summary: Front desk was unsmiling and uncaring and acted like they hated working there or anywhere else for that matter. I had an ADA room which was not cleaned thoroughly as the seat for the tub was dirty and there was oil/lubricant on the nightstand. The A/C was NOISY the entire time it was running as the fan never shut off even if it reached the temperature it was set at. There was also a problem with the bathroom light and the kid at the front desk said he'd get maintenance on it and when I went back an hour later the lady said there was nothing in the computer about it. I was offered another room but I was tired and said I'd sleep with the bathroom door closed as I was done with this place. I was in the same area last night but stay at a different place that I was very happy with
Manager Response: Hello sacbear,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience at our hotel.  I would like to apologize for a less than enjoyable experience.  I want to assure you that every issue that you brought up to us as been taken care.  We regret that you would not let us change your room to accommodate you better.  We hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Easy check in, nice bed, modern appliances. Flat screen TV, roomy.  One lamp didn't work in the room, and was too tired to call anyone. But the shower is awesome. Love the massaging showerhead. The location is actually pretty good. It's kind of in an industrial area away from the busy streets. I would recommend this hotel. Good price too and close enough to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Ali P,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and thank you for your compliments.  While we are in an industrial area our guests choose us because we are 10 minutes away driving distance to Disneyland but we are not so close that you would experience the crowds. We are sorry that your lamp did not work, we will share your review with our maintenance team to make sure that they only turn clean rooms with all light properly working.  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel to stay if in Los Angeles
Summary: I stayed there with my family for 4 night, it was nothing but awesome. Very conveniently located and accessible to 2 freeways, surrounded with no noise walls. A beautiful 3 story hotel with elevator, with great lobby décor and wonderful welcoming staff. Ample verity of items for breakfast fresh fruit, meat items, dairy and juices. Overall it was and ultimate experience for us.
Manager Response: Hello QIKesh K,  Thank you for your complement, we are very happy to know that you had a great stay at our hotel.  Our everyday goal is to keep our guest happy and comfortable while visit our hotel.  We do have a plentiful breakfast that guests enjoy due to the variety of items, there is always something for everyone.   Again we thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: This location was about a 10 minute drive from Disneyland, the reason for my visit.  I checked in about 8p.m. and had to wait about 7 minutes to be helped. When the young man came to assist with check-in I was pleased by the quick and fairly pleasant manner in which my transaction transpired. I received my key card and was able to park and head up to the room. The parking was a bit dark and most nights plentiful, except for Saturday when I had to park on the darkest side of the lot.  My room was on the 3rd floor and the elevator was fast, clean and smelled like crayons (wasn't a real bother). It took me up to a door of hallways that was well lit and nicely displayed the room numbers. I was near the pool side exit and steps away from the ice machine. I never heard anything!  The
Manager Response: Hello 559Mom,  We want to thank you for sharing your experience while visiting our hotel.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found value for the price paid.  Our everyday goal at our hotel is to provide a clean and comfortable room.  I am glad that you experience great customer service, good selection in our breakfast room, ample complimentary parking and clean and comfortable rooms.  Just so you know we also offer complimentary Wifi.    Thank you for your great review and we hope that your next visit is as great and enjoyable as this one was.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: We stayed here on our trip to to the "Run for our sons" fundraiser for Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy at Disneyland.  It was a little far away but not too bad, took about 10 minutes.  The room was clean, the bed was updated and comfortable.  The room had a fridge, a microwave and a coffeemaker, all plus' since we really needed to save money.  The free breakfast was pretty good, it did have sausage patties and round egg patties so we made some breakfast sandwiches.  I didn't see a hot tub, but that was okay with me.  It's a basic hotel, clean, safe and comfortable.  I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello SongDog007,  Thank you for letting us know that our hotel is clean, safe and comfortable.  We always enjoy reading great reviews like yours.  We do offer complimentary continental breakfast, complimentary wifi and parking.  Our team's goal is to offer the best customer service and clean and comfortable rooms and I am glad that we are reaching our objective.  Yes our rooms are equipped with mini refrigerators, microwaves, hair dryers, coffee makers and irons with ironing boards.  We are glad that you enjoyed the amenities at our hotel.  Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: The staff wasn't very friendly or accommodating at this hotel.  After staying at several hotels where we had people walking around on top of us all night I asked for a room on the top floor but was told there weren't any.  A family member checked in 30 minutes after us and they got a top floor room.  So once again we had a noisy stay and poor sleep.   They did have a better than normal breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello Dave E,  First of all I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  We apologize that our hotel did not have the room type that you requested on the top floor.  I will be making sure that our guest services agents are providing the best customer service and that they are making every possible effort to accommodate our guests with their requests. We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast, our breakfast attendants are very proud of the service and the products we provide.  We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better on your next stay in the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary Heading: Need more Places like this for regular business travel
Summary: This is a great well priced place to stay for business trips if you want to avoid the Anaheim Disneyland involved prices. The rooms are beautiful clean and quiet, the staff are firendly, the hot breakfast included in the price is great. They even offer complimentory toiletries in case you forget something. I highly recomnd this place.
Manager Response: Hello 73Yannib,  It is always great to hear that our team is doing a great job in providing the best customer service and clean and comfortable rooms.  We will be using your review as encouragement so our team keeps striving to offer the best of accommodations.  We are very happy that you enjoyed the amenities and for recognizing our hotel as been of good value.    Thank you for your time in writing this review and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: This was a surprisingly pleasant experience at an affordable price.  The beds are pillowtop and very comfortable.  The rooms are a bit small but very clean.  They also have microwaves and nicely sized refrigerators and FREE BREAKFAST and freshly baked cookies in the afternoon.  Most of the staff was very friendly and accomodating.  There is a nice, although pricey laundry room, pool and a small fitness center.  Everything you could want at an affordable price.
Manager Response: Hello lusciouslee,  We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay you felt that we are affordable.  We do try to offer the most for the best, our housekeeping department takes pride in providing a clean and comfortable rooms.  We are glad that you enjoyed the refrigerator and the microwave.   Thank you for a great review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: We were traveling with large groups of high school boys and girls for the National Jr Olympics for Water Polo.  The hotel did a great job having things organized and ready to go upon our check in even though we had several rooms and staggered check ins with teams arriving different days and times.  Breakfast was the usual and worked out great for the kids etc...  Not too far from stores and restaurants if you want to get food.  Each room had a microwave and fridge so you can keep some food on hand.
Manager Response: Hello Mike W,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are very glad that your group had a great time while visiting our hotel.  Thank you for letting us know that our group sales team did a great job of taking care of your request and that all went well according to plan.  We do offer a mini refrigerator and a microwave for our guest convenience thank your for mentioning that.  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager.

Summary: Stayed here for about almost a week last May 2015. First day , we were amazed at the breakfast for its selection. But it's the same selection everyday. Hope you can change the breakfast menu spread every other day at the least. All day cookies made it up for me. I love it!! I think it's Job who bakes it?! :)  There are few fast food stops nearby but it's few minutes walk. The hotel room is quite spacious but the interior is quite old. However, for the price, and quiet surroundings, overall it's okay for me. Shoutout to Job, Jackie and Danushi! :)  For being helpful all the time during my queries at the reception. They're always ready to help!
Manager Response: Hellokath,  Thank you very much for praising our staff.  Our hotel's daily objective is to offer great service and a clean and comfortable room every single time.  We are glad that you enjoyed the cookies and we will pass on your message to upper management for alternating the breakfast menu.  Thank you again for your comments and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Quiet hotel not far from Disneyland
Summary: This is a gem of a hotel located down a quiet street. The hotel was clean and comfortable and the staff were friendly. They have a nice pool area, and breakfast was good in the morning,  Not too many places to eat within walking distance, but they are only a short drive away. This hotel was more reasonably priced than hotels closer to Disneyland, and it was only a 15-20min drive away.  Well worth a stay if you don't want to spend a fortune on accomodation near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Jason S,  Thank you for a great review on our hotel.  We are happy to know that our hotel was of great value and that you had a great time while visiting.  We do offer complimentary breakfast, wifi and parking for the convenience of our guest.    Again thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager.

Summary: Totally amazing!!  Stopped off in Anaheim for a couple of days with our young group of basketballers so they could have the Adventure Park experience at Knotts Berry Farm & Disneyland.  Finding a place to accommodate our group size and various ages was proving difficult until I came across Quality Inn Placentia and our amazing host Jackie.  Absolutely nothing throughout the entire process from start to finish was a problem for Jackie...her and the staff truly made our stay a pleasurable one.  Rooms were clean & tidy and the beds were very comfortable.  We had been in Las Vegas for 8 days prior & preparing our own breakfast so it was a treat to have a lovely breakfast ready for us each morning when at Quality Inn...Waffles were wonderful :-)  Will definitely be making this our
Manager Response: Hello 8Philly,  Thank your for an amazing review.  We are very glad that you and your basketball group enjoyed their stay.  I am glad that you have recognize the work or our Sales Manager Jackie and of our dedicated staff.  Our team does take pride in the cleanliness and comfort of the rooms, we will be sharing your comment with our staff to serve as encouragement.    Thank you for choosing our hotel for your group and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: My husband only stayed one night here, but we enjoyed our stay.  The room was clean abd quiet; we did not hear any of the other guests around.  We liked the nice pool area, and had a delicious breakfast for a fast start to our day.  All of the employees we met were courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello MEKeller,  We are delighted to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your stay at our hotel the Quality Inn Placentia.  We are glad that you got to use the pool and that our breakfast was to your satisfaction.  Our hotel also offers complimentary parking and complimentary wifi for our guests convenience.  Our staff's goal is to make you feel at home when you visit our hotel and I am happy to know that they were courteous and helpful.    We thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Less than impressed, but the breakfast was hot
Summary: Booked this hotel for a training session I was attending in Anaheim, at the recommendation of the school.  The discounted rate was good and the pictures looked fine, so it looked like a good idea.  Overall, my room was clean and the air conditioning worked. Bonus refrigerator and microwave in the room, so that was nice as well.  However, the staff working the counter was less than impressive.  No personality, no desire to help, no professionalism. Lack in training perhaps? Customer service is so important and it's a shame that aspect was overlooked.
Manager Response: Hello scvClaudia,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at our hotel the Quality Inn Placentia.  I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant customer service experience.  Our priority at our hotel is to offer clean, comfortable rooms and great customer service.  I am very sorry to hear that customer service was lacking, I will be conducting better training and will share your review with our staff.    Thank you for letting us know that your room was clean.  Our hotel offers complimentary breakfast, Wifi and parking.  In addition, our rooms are equipped with mini refrigerators, microwaves and hair dryers.  I am glad that you enjoyed those amenities.  It is our hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in your future stays.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: So i was getting some luggage out of my vehicle and this dude named RUBEN came over and helped us with the luggage. Without any one telling him too super kid totally rad dude. I ll come back here soon
Manager Response: Hello Krystal J,  Thank you for letting us know that our staff is doing the right thing when it comes to helping our guests.  We have trained our staff to deliver great customer service and we are glad that you have recognized Ruben for going above and beyond in customer service.  We have shared your comment with him and have also recognized his customer service.   Thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights this week. The linens were clean, but the floor in the bathroom left a lot to be desired, as well as the carpeting. The place is definitely old and tired, but I have seen worse. The breakfast was o.k. The staff were quite friendly. An o.k. stay but not sure I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello LucyLouSantaBar...  First of all I would like to apologize for not delivering a clean and comfortable room.  One of our goals at the Quality Inn Placentia is to offer clean and comfortable rooms and I am disappointed that we were not able to deliver great accommodations.   I have checked and reviewed the procedure on how the bathroom floors are cleaned and we have retrained housekeeping staff on how to better clean the bathrooms.  We appreciate your review and we hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Not having a good customer experience at this motel
Summary: I got this motel through my work and I chose it primarily on the fat that it got very good reviews on this site and had a decent price. But what I found was that customer service at this facility is lacking. My family and I are currently staying here. It's not fancy but a decent, clean hotel. Breakfast is good, beds are comfortable and there's plenty of parking. However, we didn't always get clean towels and when it came to housekeeping service, so far they've missed a day. I brought up the missed house keeping with two people at the desk and so far have been brushed off regarding this issue. I've been asked by both: "Was your 'do not disturb' sign up" and "Did you turn them away." My answer to both front desk personnel has been "no." Anyway, if you plan on staying here, be
Manager Response: Dear Aztraveler1616,  Please allow me to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel. I have checked both housekeeping reports, one from the room attendant and one from our supervisor and found both reports to show do not disturb sign.  I apologize for the inconvenience, we do have a room attendant at night that will clean your room even if it is late at night.  Thank you for bringing this up in your review I will make sure that we are doing everything possible to accommodate our guests, we can also offer another room in this case.    Thank you for letting us know that our breakfast attendant delivered great service, we will be sure to recognized her efforts.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Very nice, clean hotel, on a quiet street.  Nothing real close (walking distance) to eat, but within a mile or two are plenty of places to eat and things to do.  Hotel is in process from switching from former hotel to a Quality Inn, so furniture was being replaced, as well as carpeting.  Typical continental breakfast served.....free parking....free wifi, cookies in the afternoon.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Shirley R,  Thank you for such a great review.  Your feedback is very important to us and we have shared your comments with our staff to let them know that they are doing a great job.  Reviews like yours serve as encouragement for our staff to keep delivering clean and comfortable accommodations to our guests.  We are glad that you will consider our hotel for your next stay and we hope to see you soon.  Again thank you for your comments and for your time to write this review.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: We came to town without having hotel reservations and needed someplace to sleep for the night. I searched TA and found this hotel to be the closest, cleanest, and least expensive option in the area. The room was clean, the staff was friendly and breakfast was included. No complaints here.
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer B,  Thank you for your review.   We are glad that you found our hotel convenient and of good value to you.  We strive to deliver a clean and comfortable room to each and every one of our guests.  We also offer complimentary Wifi, complimentary parking and yes complimentary breakfast which other guests have great comments about.  Our priority at the Quality Inn Placentia is to provide the best customer service so your stay is memorable.    We hope that you consider staying with us again when you visit this area.   Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Not a clean place to stay.
Summary: The night clerk was not friendly upon our checking in when we arrived late at the hotel.  There were no soaps in the room, we had to use our own shampoo to wash our hands.  The bed sheets on both beds were dirty with stains.  It was 1:30 a.m. when we discovered this, and we didn't want to deal with the unfriendly clerk again so we just had to sleep on those stained bed sheets.  However, when we checked out in the morning, I've complained to the clerk & after consulting with her manager, she gave us a discount of $20.00 which is nothing compares to the condition & the amenity that we didn't received for the price we've paid.  Overall, I would not want to stay at this hotel ever again.
Manager Response: Hello jlcnguyen,  First of all on behalf of the Quality Inn Placentia team I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations.  I am very sorry that you were given a rooms with no amenities and dirty sheets.  We are a team that is proud of the service level of our hotel as previous guests have expressed.  I am sorry that you perceived our night auditor as not friendly, I have shared your comment with the team and we will make sure that none of our future guests experience an unfriendly perception from our team members.  We did approve a 30% discount on your room and we apologized for the inconvenience.  If you had spoken to any manager or have brought your concerns to our staff we would have made your stay enjoyable. It is our hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: The staff was most helpful, especially Nancy.  We arrived early after a long drive and she found us a room right away.  The room was spotless and the beds extremely comfortable.  Nancy also provided us with a list of restaurants in the area.  This was extremely helpful and we used it the entire weekend.
Manager Response: Hello casadblu,  I want to thank you for recognizing the great customer services from Nancy one of our front desk agents.  Like her, everyone in our Quality Inn team strives to provide a clean and comfortable room and especially great customer service.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay and we hope that you choose our hotel for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: The reason I stay at Quality Inns is that there is a level of comfort and cleanliness that I have come to expect, and this one did not disappoint. It was immaculate.  But, beyond just that, the service was incredible. I messed up my reservation for Memorial Day weekend, and in spite of them being sold out, Ricardo jockied reservations around and was able to give me the extra nights that I needed to stay. I have no words to express my appreciation. Where else can you get service like this?  I only wish I could give them 10 stars!
Manager Response: Hello DocSavage01,  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel but we are specially glad that one of our team members was have to accommodate your reservation on a holiday and busy weekend.  Our team at Quality Inn Placentia strives to deliver the best services possible to each and every one of our guest.  We have shared your comment with our team to encourage them to do whatever it takes to deliver great service and clean and comfortable accommodations.   Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel for its proximity to a local brewery. It was clean. The staff were pleasant; and we felt very safe. It is in an industrial area, but we had no problems. Would stay here again. Also seems to be a popular spot for families hitting up Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear traveller2332,  Thank you for your great review and we are glad that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.   The hotel is in an industrial area and we are secluded from major traffic but we are still very popular with guests that want to enjoy Disneyland but not the crowds.  The Brewery is close to the hotel if you wish to walk there is only a 10 minute walk or is just a drive around the corner.    We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary: Decided to stay in town at the last minute, was too tired to drive home. I was pleasantly surprised. The room was clean it was in a nice quiet area and the bed was comfortable. I will be staying again and I do recommend this hotel.  When I arrived there was a bottle of water and a candy bar with my name thanking me for my business, that went a long with me. My grandmother used to always say it is the little things that count, and it let me know they actually reserved a room not just when you come to check in they go through the computer to see which room is available. From the phone call of the reservation to the front desk checking in the staff was AWESOME...  I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Ernestine M,  Thank you for your review on our hotel.  Your comments are very important to us as we use them to encourage our team members to do a better job.  Our team strives to deliver a clean and comfortable room to each and everyone of our guests and we thank you for recognizing that.  We are glad that you enjoyed the water and candy bar left in your room for being a Choice Privilege member.  Again we thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Not bad stay. Laundry room used to be 27/7. Now it's 8 to 10 pm. Really limities ones options with only one washer and one dryer. Copy of restaurant listing in area barely readable after countless  times of recopying.
Manager Response: Hello tonyvas328,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at our hotel.  Please accept my sincere apology about the new laundry hours, the modification was due to guest having issues with the noise from the laundry room.  I will make sure that our new copies for the list of restaurant is nice and clear.    Your feedback is important to us and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary: This hotel is not much to look at on the outside, but our room was very nice, was very clean, and our bed comfortable. Loved the big-screen TV and large shower. Breakfast was great, with lots of choices. I would definitely recommend this hotel to other travelers.
Manager Response: Dear Becky G,  We appreciate your great review and we are glad that you enjoyed the amenities of the hotel.  Our hotel does offer a complimentary continental breakfast that has a lot of items to choose from.  We hope that you make our hotel your hotel of choice when you come back to this area and thank you for recommending us to your friends and family.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary Heading: Good Quality, Nice Stay, Friendly Staff
Summary: We booked this hotel on short notice for a weekend getaway.  We've never stayed in Placentia before, so we didn't know what to expect.  We had two rooms and found both of them spotless.  The rooms seemed updated with flat screen TV's, microwaves, and a refridgerator.  The beds were comfortable, and the rooms were quiet.  We didn't hear a peep from anyone, and the hotel had a high occupancy rate.  Every member of the staff we encountered was very pleasant.  We had no issues with anything.  The morining breakfast was standard, but good, again, no complaints. Everything was stocked up and there was little wait time for anything. We were going to Knott's Berry Farm, it was about six miles, so it wasn't that far.  It took about 15 minutes to get to the park.  The pool was closed
Manager Response: Hello Jeffrey_03,  We are very pleased to hear that you had a good time while staying at our hotel.  Our staff always strives to provide clean and comfortable accommodations.  Unfortunately the pool was out of service but it will be back in service this weekend. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: I brought my high school choir group here on tour, and was thoroughly impressed with Quality Inn Placentia.  Our experience was first-rate from start to finish.  Getting a quote, placing the reservation, checking in--all were as easy and pleasant as I could've wished for.  Our rooms were all together, and nice, clean, updated.  The Quality Inn staff were courteous and helpful, and just as anxious to look out for my teenagers as I was.  They went above and beyond in assisting me with one sick student, made a recommendation for a nearby urgent care, etc.  Breakfast was delicious and plentiful.  Walls and floors are thick enough that we didn't worry about noise (ours or anyone else's).  We will definitely keep this hotel in mind for our next SoCal trip!  Thanks, Quality Inn!
Manager Response: Hello Laura H,  Thank you for your positive feedback from your stay at our hotel.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was helpful.  Our everyday goal at the Quality Inn Placentia is to provide great service and great accommodations.  We hope to see you soon in the near future.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: For some reason this hotel has better reviews than it deserves.  This is a below average Quality Inn with smaller than average rooms.  The pool is small and poorly maintained; there is no hot tub.  The area is not bad but just alright. The staff borders on rude at times and frequently appears to be snickering at the customers. The breakfast attendant is pleasant and helpful. The breakfast food itself is average to poor.  The beds were pretty comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear ruinslover, Allow me to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  I will be sharing and discussing with our staff your comments and we will make sure that our future guest leave our hotel satisfied.  Thank you for your feedback and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better on your future stays.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: This is a typical Quality Inn hotel. The bed was comfortable, the shower had nice pressure, and the room was quiet other than the air conditioner rattling due to the front of it being loose. I just put my backpack against it, and that stopped it. You never know if the towels you get at a Quality Inn will be decent or not, but the towels were cheap and thin. The internet was very slow in the evenings, but was faster during the day.   The breakfast wasn't any special, and the food was just okay. Your usual Quality Inn. The room was more expensive than I would have liked, but it wasn't overpriced. The convenience is the reason I stayed there. I would stay here again if it was a little cheaper, otherwise I will look for a place in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear WindTraveler101,  Please accept my sincere apology for not providing exceptional service to you while staying at our hotel.  We have shared your comments in our staff meetings and we will make sure to improve in the areas that you have mentioned.  Again we apologized for a less than pleasant stay we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Okay so I stayed here two nights. The service at the front desk was pleasant I felt very comfortable. The room was nice and clean. It was just me so the bathroom being small didn't bother me. The first morning me being there, service was great at breakfast however the food wasn't stocked as needed, trash wasn't taken out and overflowing and tables weren't clean. However the next morning, it was much better! Housekeeping is amazing and kept my room stocked and cleaned! Overall it was a great experience!
Manager Response: Hello Thee_nefertiti,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are glad that you found value while staying at our hotel.  Your feedback is very important to us we will be making sure that breakfast is well stock at all times during breakfast hours and that trash is being changed on a timely manner.  We appreciate your comments and we hope to see you soon,  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Small Rooms but Very Clean and Nice
Summary: We stayed here back in 2011 when it was the Fairfield Inn.  The area isn't the best, but the hotel is very clean and well-kept up.  The bed was comfy, but the bathroom and room was small.  We were given this as part of a travel package, so we didn't mind too much.  If I was in the area and needed to stay somewhere for business, I may possibly stay here.  Next time though, we will probably just stay closer to Disney.  It definitely is a little bit of a hike to get there.
Manager Response: Hello Jess5K,  Thank you for your review on our hotel. We are glad that you found the hotel to be comfortable and well kept.  We are about a 10 minute drive to Disneyland but relatively close.  Our staff is dedicated in providing great accommodations to our guest and we are glad that you enjoyed our hotel.  Sorry about the disappointment with the size of our rooms.  Again thank you for your review and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better.  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: I came to Anaheim in January to attend the NAMM convention for the first time. I found the Quality Inn Placentia online and chose it because of the ratings. When I got there the hotel was everything it was stated to be online. For the first three of my scheduled four days I booked a single, but on the fourth day, I needed a room with double beds. Nancy at the front desk made the switch very easy for me and didn't charge me extra. The rooms were clean, the staff was attentive and helpful, the heated outdoor pool was nice as well. The  distance between the hotel and the Anaheim Convention was only a ten minute drive. I will be coming back for NAMM next year and provided I don't find a place closer to the convention ctr. I will be staying here again. Thanks for a great stay. Brian E
Manager Response: Hello Brian E,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay at our hotel.  I have shared your comments with my staff, and they join me in thanking you for your kind words.  We take pride in our hotel and the services we provide and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  Nancy thanks you for commenting about her customer service and high remarks about your accommodations.  We are looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations and service the next time you are in town.  Hopefully you choose us for your next NAMM convention.  Kind Regards,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager Quality Inn Placentia-Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights at the end of our road trip and the hotel was ok for our purposes. It was clean which was great but in serious need of updating. It was fairly run down but on the upside had a fridge and microwave which was useful. The hotel is not within walking distance of any restaurants however it does offer breakfast which again is ok. I think there are better hotels to stay at if I was in this area again.
Manager Response: Hello Angela J.  I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review on our hotel.  We appreciate your comment about our hotel been clean, our staff strives to provide a clean and comfortable room to each of our guest.  We apologize for failing below your expectations and we hope that you give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Tucked away on a side street off an industrial road, this hotel exceeded all my expectations and is a great value.Presents well both outside and in.Terrific attitude and demeanor of front desk staff on check-in and out.Room itself is very tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean.Nice name-brand LCD TV with lots of channels.The shower was luxuriously hot with great pressure and a nice high showerhead.Even the bed was very comfortable, with adult-sized pillows, as opposed to most other Quality Inns that have child-sized pillows.Not much within walking distance, so have dinner prior to coming here.Overall, an A+, well-run, very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Hello William J,  Thank you so much for such high rating of our hotel.  Our everyday goal is to provide the best accommodations possible to our valued guests.  Our entire staff thanks you for appreciating our hard work.  Thank you for letting us know that our hotel was of great value to you.  We appreciate your comments and we hope that you choose our hotel on your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Value for money friendly staff.
Summary: Have stayed at the hotel a few times now, One of the best value for money hotels I have stayed in globally for the past few years. Since I spend about 140 days in hotels per year I have experienced all levels. With plenty of parking, good breakfast choices including the friendliest breakfast staff I have ever met. The rooms are kept clean and the entire ambience is good for a hotel with this price point. If there are any problems that are taken care of efficiently and in a friendly manner. Look forward to visiting again soon.
Manager Response: Hello John K,  Our team certainly appreciates your comments about our hotel.  We are happy to know that our hard work is paying off.  Our team thanks you for appreciating the customer service and the cleanliness of the rooms and we want to thank you for choosing our hotel when you visit this area.    On behalf of our entire team, thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to serve you better on your next visit.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: We got the room on the first floor facing the parking lot. Modern spacious room Very clean and ac works great. They have Good breakfast n friendly front desk. About 7 miles from disneyland. Wi fi works great. The parking lot well lighted. Located in the good neighborhood.
Manager Response: We are humbled to get your candid review! we would like to thank you so much for taking the time our of your schedule and to take the time to write our hotel a review!  We are very happy you enjoyed Placentia CA!  Happy 2015!

Summary: Thanks to previous reviews, we got a 3rd floor room and had a decent stay. It was New Year's Eve so I expected worse noise...but none that I noticed. Breakfast was ok, hot options in addition to cereal, breads, etc. For this area, perhaps the price was average but I consider it on the high side. We would return though. Felt safe, lots of families staying here.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed our Rooms and quiet interior corridor hotel ! we always try to exceed ourselves in service and quality and we are very happy you liked both!   Happy 2015!

Summary: Hubby and I visited in early November 2014, we drove down from the bay area for a business trip and arrived earlier than expected. I wasn't feeling well from the drive and we called and asked if we could check in early. Without any problems  we checked in around 1:30pm. First impressions where the room was a bit small, so probably not a good place for a large family in one room.  Pros~  Overall nice friendly staff. Clean room. Yummy make your own waffles and a hearty breakfast that helped us save money in the long run. Not too far to Disney. However you would have to drive there and leave early if you want to beat the rush. People complained about the noise, we where on the third floor but we didn't experience any noise problems and we both are very sensitive to noise.  Cons~
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast ! we always try to exceed ourselves in service and quality and we are very happy you liked both!   Happy 2015!  Quality Inn Placentia

Summary: Tried to check in early and there were no rooms available. That's ok. But check in is 3pm and when I returned at 4:30pm, they did not have a room ready. They explained they had been very busy. As the consumer, how is that my concern. When I complained, a room was ready.The mattress are over due for replacement. Both bed frames squeaked loudly when you turned in bed. The clock in the room didn't work. Cheaper than the Marriott Residence Inn next door but pay the extra $$ next time and stay there.
Manager Response: Hello Mmmmmmmmh,  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations.  We will make sure that our team understands the importance of having clean rooms by check in time.  Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.  It is our hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: I am rating 2 stars based on the quality of my sleep (which, clearly, I am not getting since I am writing this review at 1 am), most of which is out of the control of the hotel owners/staff (train nearby, freeway nearby, etc). This is part hotel, part motel, with a large percentage of the rooms opening to the outside walkways. I was in a 3rd floor, inside doorway.   Pros: The hotel is inexpensive. The staff is very friendly. The room was clean. Incredible water pressure in the shower.   Cons: My main issues are with the inadequate soundproofing. I could hear snoring, talking, TV, etc... from the rooms next door and above and below. There is not likely to be anything that the hotel company can do to correct this (or would be cost prohibitive). I also unplugged the refrigerator
Manager Response: Dear Businesspeep,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel.    On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.  We are glad that you felt that our customer service was great and that our hotel was nice and clean.  If you are ever not satisfied with the room you are assigned to please let our attentive front desk staff know and they will make sure that you are place in a room to your satisfaction.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: First walking into the room it was very clean, nice sized & spotless. Good working microwave & refrigerator, theirs also a coffee/tea maker wich is nice. The bed is comfy & the  flat screen is a nice touch. The bathroom is bigger then most hotel bathrooms, wich I liked the big bathroom alot. The bathroom was also very clean & stocked with plenty of clean white towels. THUMBS UP!
Manager Response: Hello Cheyanne H,  Thank you for your great review about our hotel.  Our team takes pride in providing clean and comfortable rooms as well as great value for your hard earned money.  We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and we hope that you choose our hotel for your future stays in the area.    Thank you again for your great comments, we have shared them with our team as encouragement to keep on providing great customer service.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: This motel was an excellent value in the Anaheim area. The room was spacious,well equipped,well maintained and very,very clean.Access to highways  was convenient and quick.The continental breakfast was excellent with plenty of room,hot items,well restocked and a good variety of choices.I would highly recommend this location for a stay. Anton at the main desk was very helpful and a nice young man.
Manager Response: Hello Maggellan,  We are delighted to hear that you highly recommend our hotel.  It gives our team great satisfaction to know that their hard work is paying off.  Your review will help as encouragement to our team to keep providing great customer service.  We will pass along your comment to Anton for providing exceptional service.  Thank you for your review and we hope that you choose our hotel for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary: Room was modern, comfortable, quiet, and reasonably priced. Staff was friendly and there was a very good hot breakfast with a good number of tables to use. I was even asked if I wanted a room on the first or second floor.
Manager Response: Hello M G,  On behalf of our entire team we would like to thank you for a great review on our hotel.  Our team is always working arduously to provide the best customer service possible and it gives us great satisfaction that our guests are recognizing the great work done at our hotel.  We are glad that you liked our breakfast and the plenty of options to choose from.    Thank you for your review and we hope to become your hotel of choice when you visit the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary: Because of the location, this hotel is quiet during the weekend. The rooms are very clean and up to date. The breakfast area can get a bit crowded but it works itself out.  If you are looking for a place close to Disneyland yet far off the beat path this place is for you. The restaurants in the area are must better than the high price ones near Disneyland.    I will be coming back to this location.
Manager Response: Hello mou2,  We are very happy to hear that our hotel will be your hotel of preference when you come to the area.  We are glad that hear that our hotel was of great value to you and your family.  We are in a commercial area of Placentia secluded from the busy street and that works out on our favor because the hotel stays mostly quiet.  Our breakfast can be a little crowded on the weekend because we cater to mostly families during the weekend that are here to visit Disneyland.  Our best comments come from our breakfast because we offer plenty of choices and our breakfast attendants are courteous and friendly.    We appreciate your comments and we hope to see you soon on your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary: Close to Anaheim.   Located in a business area but close to freeways.  We liked the breakfast,  fridge and microwave.   Staff were friendly and the grounds were clean.  Disneyland is not far but not busy with tourists.   We would return to the hotel when we're in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Trip Advisor Member,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel the Quality Inn Placentia.    We are glad that you found value in our hotel.  Our team strives to provide great customer service and your review will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for our guests.  We will be delighted to serve your hospitality needs when you visit the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez

Summary: We stayed at this Quality Inn for one night and our lungs could not take any more of it.  We stayed in room 148.  And although the room had a slight stench, it seemed like a basic budget hotel room.   The beds were nice and we enjoyed the large refrigerator and microwave.   The bathroom was dirty and there was the odor of urine.   However, the reason for the one star is the terrible air quality.  We could smell mold coming from the air conditioner, but figured that maybe it hadn't been used for a while, so let it go.   We both woke up sore throats, coughing and headaches the next morning because of the air quality.   The windows don't open so there is no relief or fresh air.   Our symptoms were alleviated later that evening after we moved to another hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Kathleen G,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel.   I would like to apologize for not providing you a room that is not up to standards.  Our team strives to provide clean and comfortable accommodations for every guest in our hotel.  If you encounter the same situation in the future please advise one of our team members and they will make anything possible to provide you a room that accommodates to you and your family.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Staying in the Quality Inn was very nice.  The young man who checked us in was helpful and really tried to go above and beyond to help our stay be pleasant.  The continental breakfast was plentiful, the room was clean and everything worked.  The checkout was by a young woman who gave us the impression that we could not leave fast enough to suit her. She was very curt and impatient.
Manager Response: Hello Mark D,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and the breakfast.  Allow me to apologize on behalf of our hotel for failing to meet your expectations regarding our customer service at the time of check out on your recent visit to our hotel.  I have shared your feedback with our front desk agents to ensure we handle these types of situations differently in the future.   Again, thank you for your time and valuable feedback.  We sincerely appreciate it and hope you will give us another chance to provide you with superior service and accommodations on your next visit to Placentia.  Kind Regards,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Was very happy with our stay. Every staff member was vey pleasant and helpful. There was definitely a family feel.Would stay again. Our room and the hotel in general was very clean. The breakfast was guite nice, good variety.
Manager Response: Hello Janice B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel the Quality Inn Placentia.  Our team appreciates very much your comments because it portraits exactly what we strive to provide.  Our team is very proud to provide a clean and comfortable room for our guest and I am glad that you felt like at home with your room.  We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast and yes we do have plenty of variety for your satisfaction.    Again thank you for your comments and we will be delighted if you make our hotel your choice for your next trip to the area.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: It all starts with the manager who is sharp, attentive and efficient! The place is beautifully maintained and the room was way above expectations. Needed to leave a little early for Canada and the manager promptly ensured that this would be solved swiftly. Will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay at our hotel.  I am happy to hear that your stay was pleasant and that our team provided exceptional service.  Our entire team is dedicated to provide the best service possible and I am glad to hear that you found our hotel to be clean and comfortable.  We appreciate your comments as they will give our team members encouragement to keep delivering exceptional service.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez   General Manager

Summary Heading: A few ants but I would stay again
Summary: Stayed in room 316.  At any given moment, there were about five small ants in the bathroom, but it was no big deal.  Room was very quiet, with microwave, fridge, free wi-fi, and decent free breakfast.  Takes about 15 minutes to drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Mikethern,  I want to thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Reviews like yours help our team be proactive and ensure that we offer the best service possible to our future guests.  I apologize for the ants problem, our pest control company has taken care of this issue already. Our hotel does offer a microwave, refrigerator, complimentary Wi-Fi and parking.  Most attractions are with-in 15 minutes of driving as we are centrally located.   We appreciate your review, our hotel strives to provide the best service possible and your review  will help us do it much better.    Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: Our overall stay was excellent.  The cost was affordable and reasonable.  The staff members at the front counter were friendly and helpful. The room was clean, well stocked and the AC worked very well. The area is very quiet and close by many eateries.  Very close to Fullerton university. This will definitely be a place to stay when were in town.
Manager Response: Hello TheresaZ_11,  I want to thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am glad that our staff offered great customer service during your stay.  We pride ourselves in providing a great value and we are very happy that you recognized that about our hotel.  We are in a secluded part of Placentia and are surrounded by businesses therefore our hotel tends to be very quiet.  The University of Fullerton is less than a mile away and there are plenty of eateries in our surroundings.    We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and it is our hope that you stay with us in your future visits to the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary: This was a very nice hotel to stay in, front desk workers were very kind and knowledgeable about local beaches. The little lady that made us breakfast was very sweet and helpful and kept filling up the little buffet area with great food ex. eggs sausage waffles bagels coffee juices. Very great place for reasonable price. We will definitely be back.  P.S. I loved that we weren't bothered at the crack of dawn with house keeping like most places.
Manager Response: Hello laurakmiller,  On behalf of our entire team I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel.  Our team takes great pride in providing superior customer service.  Our guests satisfaction is our number one priority and it gives us great satisfaction when we learn that our guest are enjoying their stay.  Thank you for the great review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, Updated Room but a Couple Service Issues
Summary: We had booked this room about a month in advance through Expedia, however when we arrived the hotel had no record of our reservation. At first we were told there were no rooms available. The front desk staff were willing to help remedy the situation and after they made some calls, about 20 minutes later, we were offered the ADA accessible room. The room was clean and updated; no problems at all with the room. The following morning at 8am, housekeeping started knocking at the door. This woke us up and we called out that we were in the room and to come back later. The knocking continued and we continued telling them to come back later, but eventually the housekeeper opened the door. Thankfully we had the door's bar latch closed so the door didn't open all the way. This was not a
Manager Response: Hello kelebogile,  I would like to thank you for your recent review on Tripadvisor.  I am sorry that our hotel failed to provide exceptional service to you.  My team is train and committed to providing great customer service.  I apologize on behalf of our entire team for a less than satisfactory stay.  I have spoken to my front desk team to make sure that issues with reservations are resolve more efficiently.  I have also spoken to our room attendants to make sure they don't disturb guests without permission.    Again I apologized for a less than pleasant stay and I hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Roberto Vasquez General Manager

Summary Heading: Fairfield Is Now A Quality Inn - Still a great value
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times in the past when it was a Fairfield Inn and this is the first time that we've stayed there since it changed to a Quality Inn. We stayed for three nights this time. Although it's in kind of an industrial area, it's very convenient to our family. We would stay there again, for sure, and found it to be a good value.  We were placed in room 329 and found it to be very clean, in good repair, and very quiet. It was nice to have a small refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker.   Although we did have a small problem with the bathroom sink (it drained very slowly) when we mentioned it to the front desk it was immediately taken care of. This was a nice touch and showed that the staff cares about the guests and about the hotel's reputation.

A lot of people may not really know about this place.  It was recently a Fairfield Inn.  And it is very evident the Marriott quality is still alive at the Choice Hotel price.  This is a very clean, quiet and affordable hotel.  We stayed here 5 nights for a Disneyland vacation.  The room we got was very neat and clean.  It had 2 double beds, a 32-inch flat screen TV, refrigerator, and microwave. While I found the double beds to be a little small, the pillows and bedding were very comfortable.  The bathroom was very clean, however it lacked a fan. The continental breakfast was exceptional. It was a lot more than just coffee and pastries. For example, eggs, waffles, sausage or ham, cereals, muffins, bagels, juice, and yogurt. All the staff are nice and friendly.  This hotel is not

We stayed here for one night I'm July for a basketball tournament in Garden grove.  The price was reasonable and the room was well maintained with no major issues.  Chair upholstery was a little stained but we didn't use it anyway.   Shower was good and bed was comfortable.  A/C worked great as well.    We had booked a king but they were able to get us I to a double with no issues.    All in all well worth the stay.

Summary Heading: Great base for Disney, Knottsbury etc....
Summary: We chose to stay here for our first few nights in LAX just as a base really.  Check in staff were brilliant and so very helpful.  Room was very spacious and the beds were really comfy.  We had a double room which had 2 queen sized beds in it.  Room was also very clean.  The complimentary breakfast was actually very good and you really could fill yourself up on it and it was a nice touch to have complimentary coffee and tea in the lobby throughout the day.  Parking and wifi was great too.  Hotel also has a pool, which is a plus.  Hotel is in a predominantly industrial area so you do need a car to go and eat etc.  The Brea Mall is a 5-10 minute car journey. It there's loads of eateries there.  Overall would highly recommend.

Check in was quick and easy.  The room was clean and neat.  The breakfast was good and the area was well stocked and plenty of seating for the crowd on hand.  I had to look up the breakfast details in our room as we were not told about the breakfast upon check in.

Stayed 1 Night on Sat. May 17th. Booked thru Priceline and was able to get $60, about a $15 savings off of the rate if booked directly with Quality Suites.   The hotel was average, more on that below. But I was really unhappy with my reservation.   I had booked 2 adults and 1 child. My kids is 12 and about the same size as a small adult. I was given a King Room. When asked for alternatives - there was NONE. No Double bed rooms, no couch beds, no rollaways available. I was told the hotel was completely booked and people who checked in early grabbed all of the rollaways. I was checking in at 9pm. We had not alternative but to ask for a few extra sets of blankets and have the kid sleep on the floor. 45 minutes later, a service rep brought the extra blankets up.   If they could not

Summary Heading: Great value and a fine 3 star inn if you book online ahead!
Summary: This is one of the best values in the Dland area and if  you book ahead online you can get an incredible deal.  It is a very nice motel with lovely grounds and nice and comfortable rooms. Free breakfast has a good variety and the staff are warm, courteous and helpful. Rooms are cozy and beds are comfortable.  Nice small fridge and microwave in your room and you can get to area attractions easily and save money by staying here just a short distance away.  I believe one reason it is such a good value is that many visitors/tourists do not know or are familiar with the town - city - Placentia.  But as the crow flies it is actually very close to Dland and other area attractions.  Also ideal for visitors to Cal State Fulleron and other area institutions.  But book ahead online and get

Poor service, quality of room, decor and location.  Breakfast was cold and even the coffee was bad. Walls were so thin I could hear snoring from the next room and on the the other side I could here the person's conversation on her cell phone.  I stayed for one night and even that was way too long.  I couldn't in good conscience recommend anyone stay at this hotel.

Summary Heading: Hope the Quality Inn improves the property
Summary: Stayed here on March 16th, a week before it went from a Fairfield Inn to a Quality Inn.  The price was right, it was close to where I was doing business, and I wasn't on property much longer than it took to sleep and shower.  So, not so bad.  But I wouldn't go back.  I would be afraid of ending up on the first two floors.   Those rooms open up motel-style to the outside.  Only the third floor has an indoor corridor.  The room was very small, but clean.  The curtain was ripped.  The breakfast was awful.  As a business traveler and frequent Marriott patron, it was below standards.  If I were a leisure traveler willing to cut corners to save money in an expensive area, I might suck it up and stay here.

Summary Heading: on its last day as a Fairfield Inn, it was already partly a Quality Inn!
Summary: This hotel ceased to be a Fairfield Inn after March 24, 2014, and effective March 25, 2014 it's a Quality Inn (although the Choice website claims it doesn't become that for another day or two).  I've stayed at this hotel many times before (since it was usually the lowest-priced Marriott family property in the greater Anaheim area), including last week and I stayed there again last night which was the last night it was operating as a Fairfield Inn.  Today it officially turns into a Quality Inn.  On this last night, it was a mix of Fairfield Inn and Quality Inn.  I got Marriott door keys in a Marriott door key holder.  The "do not disturb" sing for the door was already Quality Inn.  The shampoo/soap/etc was already Quality Inn, but the hanging sign on the towel rack was still

Summary Heading: Clean but not a good location
Summary: We have stayed in several Fairfield Inns and found them to be reasonable quality for the money.  I have very mixed feelings on this hotel--  it felt like an old motel, but the price was cheap.  PROS:  low price; great staff (very friendly and helpful); reasonable breakfast; clean room; on 3rd floor so inside hall (1st and 2nd opened to outside which would be unacceptable to me); reasonably quiet room (but again ... we were on top floor); good lobby area. CONS:  location was industrial, remote; the hotel wasn't dirty, but it felt dirty as you entered the elevator area and hall (room was fine, but bathroom felt outdated)

It would seem most of the people staying at this hotel would be business travelers or maybe visitors to Cal State Fullerton. We stayed there on our trip to Disneyland and though it's not across the street, it's not too far of a drive. It took us maybe 10 minutes to get to Disneyland each day. I liked the continental breakfast selection and they even had a small table for my kids to sit at. Our room had two queen beds and everyone slept comfortably. The hotel staff was very friendly. The WiFi worked great and was actually about as fast as the LTE on my phone. The hotel charges for parking, which is a little weird to me, but it was still a great value so I didn't really mind. Our room happened to be one of the only rooms exactly underneath one of the outside lights and it was

This hotel is located quite a drive from Disneyland, on a secluded dark street. When we booked this hotel, we requested extra towels, feather pillows and a rollaway cot. However, when we arrived and inquired about the rollaway cot, we were told, that the fire marshal would not allow extra cots in the rooms. When we asked why the website allowed us to book the cot the clerk just shrugged. Since there were three of us, that meant one of us had to sleep on the floor. When we got in the room, we found there were no feather pillows and only a couple towels. We called down to the desk for extra towels and feather pillows, Ended up going downstairs for the towels, but could not get feather pillows. Breakfast buffet was uninspiring. Freshly made waffles were the only good thing on a

Just returned home. My only complaint is the bathroom in the lobby is so inexcusably filthy. Saturday at 11:30 am, I told the ladies at the front desk that the bathroom needed to be cleaned. 12:00 am the next day. Same pee stain all around the toilet. Sunday when I checked out at 12:30 pm. Guest what? Same old yellow pee stains all over the toilet. Please clean the toilet. #324

My husband and I stayed here New Years Eve for an Anaheim Ducks game. We were greeted by a friendly staff, the room was clean & stocked well. I had a little problem during my stay. I LOST MY PURSE! It happens. My husband and I were partying for New Years! I was a little panicked because of all the personal information contained in it. We checked out and returned home to San Diego thinking it was gone forever. I called the hotel the next day just in case and an employee FOUND AND TURNED IN MY PURSE!! Ya know, they could have just taken it & not said a word. But no. They were honest and got my purse back to me. I've been calling everyone at Marriot Headquarters who will listen. These days, kindness like this is rare. I hope the employee is recognized and I will DEFINITLY be

Summary Heading: Small, clean room at an amazing price!
Summary: Booked this hotel on Priceline for around $169 for 3 nights (total, including tax) which I thought was an amazing deal considering many people pay that for one night at a hotel near Disneyland.  We used this hotel as our base for our 2 day trip to the Disneyland resort which was about a 10 minute drive away and traffic was never an issue.  As mentioned by previous reviewers, the rooms are small but clean.  We also never had an issue with noise, including the trains that were mentioned by a previous reviewer (although we live near train tracks at home so maybe we're just use to it by now).  On New Year's Day we stopped at the free breakfast bar to grab breakfast around 6:45am on our way to Disneyland and found it closed--it was like the Twilight Zone--not one single person was at

Summary Heading: Fairfield is the worst Marriott brand name
Summary: The staff was friendly, and welcoming. I did feel safe although the area seemed a touch sketchy. Overall my only major complaint was the room was small and had a bit of a dank musty smell.   I must add the rooms are clean. I just find Fairfield in general not to be up to the standards of all other Marriott brand names., and this one was a little less than other Fairfields i have stayed at.   The price was great though so might have been worth it for just one night.

Other than the noisy train running throughout the night,  it is not a bad hotel. It is clean.  Breakfast was fine.  Free parking.  Reasonable rate.  Internet was fine. They should have put me in a room away from noisy trains.  When you check in mention that you don't want to be facing the railroad track.  AS a Platinum member, they should give me a better room.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if your going to Disneyland
Summary: Very clean place and nice people. Great free breakfast in the am. Waffles were really yummy. The lady who takes care of the breakfast is FABULOUS. On top of everything to get it refilled. She even offered to make my waffle for me ;) only about a 15 min ride to Disneyland. Way better priced then the ones right across the street. Would stay there again

This was a fantastic place to stay for our vacation to Disneyland.  Everyone we came into contact with was friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was great especially the waffles which were a big hit with the grandkids!  Our rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  Had no issues and would definitely stay there again.    Only down side was the drive to and back from Disneyland.  Though it was only about 7 miles, with traffic the first day it took 30 minutes.  Once we figured out to leave a little earlier, we missed the traffic and everything was great!  Lovely place to stay.

We stayed at the Fairfield Marriott in Placentia, CA and enjoyed the stay.  They offer nice rooms and breakfast.   We found the room reasonably priced and in an area close to the attractions we will be attending.  Our reception was exceptional.  We enjoyed how everyone helped us with check in.   We will stay here again.

Can not find any bad things to say about this hotel.Loved the breakfast rooms very clean,reception very good lovely pool great location would go back time and time again 5*.we travelled all round the state from here

I had an unexpected issue with a hotel in LA at the last minute and needed something reasonable for 4 nights. I came across this hotel as a Marriott member and saw it was located outside of LA about 35-40 mins. The reviews varied but I was most worried about the cleanliness and the high speed internet issues that some people wrote about. I was also concerned that the hotel would feel like a MOTEL because of the outside doors, but was relieved I could get inside doors on the 3rd level. Well, let me say it is best to experience properties for yourself and not rely on others reviews. This was a very pleasurable stay. The grounds were well lit and clean, pool area tidy, and the house keeping staff did a great job each day we stayed. The breakfast was decent to save money and satisfy

We stayed here around June 2013 to visit Disneyland. The place is clean and close to Disneyland. We enjoyed the hotel but didn't get a chance to use the pool. We arrived after midnight and still feeling safe. I would recommend this place if you visit Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Just as I expected, very pleasant place
Summary: I only stayed one night in the hotel but had a very nice and relaxing time.  We arrived late, it was easy to find from the highway - that was one of the reasons why I choose this hotel - and we could get in our room super quickly.  The room was spacious and clean, comfortable big beds, just as expected from a Fairfield Inn.   The pool looked very tempting, also very clean, however a little small but it is just perfect for this type of hotel.  The full surrounding of the hotel seemed pretty organized and neat, which I like, kind of shows real quality. The breakfast - as normally in the Marriott chains - was nice as well.  Good choice of food, even continental breakfast, fruits and cereals too.  We could even make our own waffels which seemed very popular among the guests.  I love

We made our reservation through priceline, bad move.  I called the hotel immediately after to secure two queen beds but they were over booked and told us all they had were kings but could give us a roll away.  Once we checked in they told me to keep checking back for cancellations.  we finally moved to a room with two queens on our 3rd night.  rooms were super small. the entire staff was helpful, and nice and I felt they all went out of their way to assist us. My kids loved the pool and it closed at 10pm which allowed us to spend all day at Disney and come back and the kids still have a few hours to swim which they absolutely loved.  Breakfast was good and plentiful with a good variety each day.  Gym was small but had what you needed for a good workout.  Staff was great which

I stayed here two nights over a weekend.  I wasn't expecting it to be the Ritz, so I wasn't disappointed.  I agree with previous reviews about the awkward location.  My room had a great view of the parking lot, dumpsters, and industrial complex that abutted the property.  I had a third floor room which was nice and clean.  I had a king sized bed and was a little disappointed that there wasn't a small table in the room, which would have been much nicer than the tiny writing desk.  The breakfast was actually good and convenient for me!  All in all, this property was above average, but not worthy of a "Very Good" rating.  My dealings with the staff were very pleasant.

we stayed here in june for a week. nice motel in a quiet and good area close to the freeway. restaurant nearby. the staff was very friendly. hugh breakfast bar with a good selection. room very clean incl. coffeemaker, fridge and wave. Only the beds were to short for me - I am 190 cm tall. Big minus of this motel was the very weak wifi signal. Not even the business computer in the lobby was running fast.

My husband and I just spent our second extended stay at this hotel (8-9 days).  The staff was very attentive, friendly and efficient.  Everyone from the front desk staff to housekeeping staff and even the contractors who happened to be in one wing of the building installing new carpeting during part of our stay greeted us with a friendly "hello" everyday and opened doors for us if we were headed in or out of the hotel.  We felt very welcome.  The room was very clean, and we're really picky about that.  The mini fridge and microwave were a nice convenience, as was the coffee maker and complimentary coffee provided.  The pool was very clean and welcoming.  The complimentary breakfast was always fully stocked with something to please most anyone, and the attendant very friendly.

our family just stayed 4 nights at Fairfield Inn Placentia for our daughters college graduation. The room was very clean, and overlooked the pool. The a/c worked excellant, and not any noise from neighboring rooms. The bathrooms are small, but workable. The housekeeping staff was friendly and efficient. We ate in the breakfast room every morning. The food consists of yogurt, sausage egg sandwiches, waffles, bananas, muffins, bagels, and juice. Typical breakfast room food. The weekend lady was very prompt and would not open or unlock anything until exaclty 7am, so dont go early! although simple, it worked for us. The parking lot was packed every night, and we even felt comfortable leaving our brand new car in the parking lot while out for the day.  If all you need is a good,

Just a 1 night stay so I picked this hotel for convenience and low price but was pleasantly surprised! Staff greeted us with smiles and let us check in early although I had not requested it in advance. They were pretty full by evening but there were no noise problems. Room was fresh and clean. Nice bed. Complimentary breakfast was as expected but again, staff was very friendly and everything was well stocked. WiFi was good.  I would definitely stay here again!

Great hotel in a quite location. Good breakfast and clean rooms. Interesting layout with the first 2 stories being outside entrance and the 3rd being inside. Only complaint about the hotel was the lack of space in the room (2 queen room). It was very tight for 2 adults, 2 kids, and a baby in a crib and the bathroom almost had no counter space at all.

Summary Heading: Good deal on a basic room w fridge & decent breakfast, not too far from Disneyland (about 6 miles).
Summary: We got a good deal on this hotel on Priceline for a 1 day trip to Disneyland on our way to Vegas. The girl at the front desk was very friendly & helpful. We had our pick of rooms and just got one on the 1st floor for ease of lugging luggage. I guess the 3rd floor rooms have inside access, our door was outside like a motel, but we didn't care.
